title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 175.12 - Required records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 175.12 - Required records

State Regulations
(a) Each
licensed commercial ground transportation operator is required to maintain the
following current information on file with the SRAA. This information shall
include, but is not limited to, the following: (1)

For each vehicle: (i) copy of current vehicle
registration; (ii)
vehicle
identification number; (iii)
license plate number; (iv)
proof of
insurance; (v) roster of drivers
authorized to operate the vehicle. (b) For each driver: (1)
copy of driver's
license. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
175.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
